price: Na ampa sε, ohunuu ne Wura Nyankopͻn nsεnkyerεnee akεseε no mu bi.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
